summary: Structural shocks: 'Liberation Day' orders in the US, DeepSeek AI market crash, and confirmed climate records amid extreme weather swings.

events.details: Vehicle-ramming and shooting in the French Quarter kills 15.
Great Comet of 2025 (C/2024 G3 ATLAS) reaches perihelion and becomes visible to the naked eye.
Santa Ana winds drive fires destroying 13,000 structures across Los Angeles County.
Magnitude 7.1 quake leaves at least 126 dead in the Tibetan Plateau.
Eighteen gunmen die in an assault on the presidential palace in N'Djamena.
2024 confirmed as the first year exceeding 1.5°C warming above pre-industrial levels.
Artificial womb milestone achieves mid-gestation Tasmanian tiger embryo.
Two judges linked to the 1988 executions are killed in Tehran.
Trump inaugurated; revokes 78 executive orders and withdraws from WHO and Paris Agreement.
Efficient Chinese LLM launch triggers a 17% intraday drop in Nvidia stock.
Google debuts Gemini-powered classroom tools at London's BETT exhibition.
Blue Origin's first New Glenn launch succeeds, though booster recovery fails.
